<title level="1" right="Rules">[Taking Damage while Dying](/Rules.aspx?ID=374)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 459 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
If you take damage while you already have the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition, increase your dying condition value by 1, or by 2 if the damage came from an attacker’s critical hit or your own critical failure. If you have the [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition, remember to add the value of your wounded condition to your dying value.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Taking Damage while Dying
